io.micronaut.tracing.brave.instrument.http

Class BraveTracingServerFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.tracing.brave.instrument.http.BraveTracingServerFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ordered, HttpFilter, HttpServerFilter

    @Filter(value="${tracing.http.server.path:/**}")
 @Requires(beans=brave.http.HttpServerHandler.class)
public class BraveTracingServerFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpServerFilter
    Instruments incoming HTTP requests.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
